EmailTemplate.description: An email confirmations sent to the applicant confirming their assessment. Sent when in compliance stage for new application.
EmailTemplate.name: New Application Assessment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Assessment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c}
Assessment confirmation
This email is to confirm {!Application__c.Site_Name__c}, {!Application__c.Site_Postcode__c} was assessed by {!Application__c.Assessor_Full_Name__c} on {!Application__c.Assessment_Date__c}.
{!Application__c.Assessor_Full_Name__c} will have left a copy of their assessment report. This report will tell you what if any a) non-compliances were found and b) evidence is needed to correct these non-compliances.
If you do have non-compliances please email your evidence to help@rspcaassured.org.uk by [date].
In the meantime, if you have any questions please feel free to contact our membership services team at the email above or on 01403 800141.
Yours sincerely
Membership services RSPCA Assured
